channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Spider-Man: Brand New Day’ Spy Shots Hint At Unusual Sadie Sink Role
item.description: Who is Sadie Sink playing in Spider-Man: Brand New Day? New spy shots suggest a role that no one predicted at all.

item.title: The Ten Scariest Horror Movies According To Viewer Heart Rate
item.description: What are the scariest horror movies of all time? A new project wants to use science to figure that out, and here is its top 10 list.

item.title: Nostalgia Isn’t Enough To Save Hollywood. But AI Might Be
item.description: Hollywood’s sequel fatigue signals a creative drought. Can AI resurrect classic stars and revive originality, ushering in a new Golden Age for the fil...

item.title: Bayern Munich’s Lena Oberdorf Suffers Second ACL Rupture In 15 Months
item.description: FC Bayern and Germany’s star midfielder Lena Oberdorf has suffered a second ACL rupture in her knee in fifteen months which will rule her out for most...

item.title: ‘Arc Raiders’ Is Now An Even More Serious Problem For Bungie’s ‘Marathon’
item.description: Arc Raiders' big beta is over, and the numbers its put up and the vibes it amassed make it an even bigger threat to Marathon than before.

item.title: Foggy mirror

item.title: It’s not a silly thing to do

item.title: Attention is a luxury good

item.title: Fermi’s Law

item.title: Significant digits
item.description: Even though it’s possible to design an oral thermometer that measures body temperature to a hundredth of a degree, there’s no reason to do so. In fact...
